front.title: COSE Header parameter for RFC 3161 Time-Stamp Tokens

abstract.t: This document defines two CBOR Signing And Encrypted (COSE) header parameters for incorporating RFC 3161-based timestamping into COSE message structures (COSE_Sign and COSE_Sign1). This enables the use of established RFC 3161 timestamping infrastructure to prove the creation time of a message.
